class  Segment

Detailed Description

Defines a spline, which can be used for such uses as a path.

Member Function Documentation

void AggOO::Spline::mergeSegments ( size_t  segIndex1,
size_t  segIndex2 
) [protected]

Merge two segments by combining their start and end knots. This will remove any segments/points within the range of segIndex1 and segIndex2.

void AggOO::Spline::InterpolationDelta ( AggOO::REAL  delta  )  [inline]

Set the interpolation delta, which is the distance between segments when interpolating the curve.

AggOO::REAL AggOO::Spline::InterpolationDelta (  )  const [inline]

Get the interpolation delta

void AggOO::Spline::MoveTo ( const PointF &  pos,
bool  rel = false 
)

Move to a point. If this is the first point, it is the start of the spline. Otherwise, it is treated as a LineTo.

Parameters:
pos Position of the point
rel If true, and this is not the first point, then this is an offset from the previous point to which to draw the line. The initial MoveTo will always be absolute.

void AggOO::Spline::LineTo ( const PointF &  pos,
bool  rel = false 
)

Draw a straight line to a point.

Parameters:
pos End position of the line
rel Indicates if pos is an absolute position, or relative to the previous position.

void AggOO::Spline::Curve3 ( const PointF &  pos,
const PointF &  ctrlPt,
bool  rel = false 
)

Draw a quadratic curve to a point.

Parameters:
pos End position of the curve
ctrlPt Control point of the curve
rel Indicates if pos and ctrlPt are absolute positions, or relative to the previous position.

void AggOO::Spline::Curve4 ( const PointF &  pos,
const PointF &  ctrlPt1,
const PointF &  ctrlPt2,
bool  rel = false 
)

Draw a cubic curve to a point.

Parameters:
pos End position of the curve
ctrlPt1 First control point of the curve
ctrlPt2 Second control point of the curve
rel Indicates if pos, ctrlPt1, and ctrlPt are absolute positions, or relative to the previous position.

AggOO::PointF AggOO::Spline::Position ( AggOO::REAL  ratio  )  const

Find a position on the spline at a given ratio (0..1, where 0 is the start of the spline, and 1 is the end of the spline.)

bool AggOO::Spline::IsClosed (  )  const

Check if the spline is closed

size_t AggOO::Spline::Close (  ) 

Close the spline (if it is not already closed.) This cannot be undone, but since all it really does is add a point to the end of the spline (making a segment that goes back to the original point,) deleting the last point in the spline would be equivalent to un- doing this action.

void AggOO::Spline::SetKnotType ( int  index,
Knot::KnotType  type 
)

Specify the type for a given node

Parameters:
index Index of the node to modify (-1 to modify all nodes)
type New type for the node
